title: What BTS song can I listen to for each emotion? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sad: Butterfly, Awake, Tokyo by RM, Stigma, Louder than Bombs, Stigma (honestly towards the end when he screams it feels like a cry out and it just-ugh), Serendipidty Lonely: Love is not over, 4′oclock, House of cards, I need U, Hold me Tight, Tear, rain, Reflection, Dpnt Leave me, Calm: Coffee, Promise, Autumn Leaves, 134340, Just One Day, Singularity, Trivia: Seesaw, Euphoria Energetic/Hype: Fire, Dope, BST, Ma City, Attack on bangtan, Boy in Luv, Hip Hop Phile(!!!!!!), Cypher pt 3, Ddaeng, Tear, Black Swan, Filter, Trivia: Just Dance, Trivia: Love “Take names, kick ass”: Come Back Home, Cypher pt 4, We are Bulletproof pt 2, Fire, Not Today, Danger, No More Dream, UGH!, Agust D Sexyyyy: House of cards (if you take at the lyrics, you WILL be sad, enjoy the vibe), Filter, Singularity (Same thing with the lyrics), War of Hormone(LOL), Expensive Girl, Blood, Sweat, and Tears, 21st Century Girl

Excitement/Motivated- Fire, Dope, Not Today, all Cyphers, Fun Boys, Rise of Bangtan, Mic Drop Remix Thoughtfulness- Rain, Sea, Life (RM), Young Forever, Blue Side (Hope World) Despair- Tomorrow, So Far Away (Agust D), The Last (Agust D), Autumn Leaves, House of Cards Broken-heartedness- Let Me Know, Save Me, I Need U, I Like It Relaxed- Butterfly, Reflection, Begin, Coffee Anger at life and the world in general- N.O, No More Dream, Danger, Baepsae, Spine Breaker, Am I Wrong, Lost, Cyphers again, Mic Drop Original, Class Idea, Come Back Home In Love- Just One Day, 24/7 Heaven, Miss Right, Converse High Loneliness- Spring Day, Let Go, Whalien 52
